title: The Beast of Macon Hollow
description: Fate brought Will Shepard to the isolated town of his ancestors where he’s thrust into a life and death struggle with the legendary Beast. With help from his sister, two new friends, and a kindly mentor, Will must unlock the secrets in Macon Hollow’s sordid past for the key to protect its future… before it’s too late!In Book 1 of The Guardian Stones Trilogy, Will Shepard’s journey to the mysterious Guardian Stone sets him on a collision course with an ancient prophecy, powerful adversaries, and his own inner demons. Can he find the strength to stop the Beast and save the world?Mysterious catacombs… wandering spirits… fearsome zombies… maniacal enemies and… the Beast! Welcome to Macon Hollow!
author: T.C. Harrelson
